title: IDEAS
text:
Introduction
My participation into the IDEAS project - Investigación y Desarrollo para la Estabilización de la frontera Agropecuaria en Colombia. The aim is to build climate indices related to land use change in Guaviare.

title: Literature
text:

Butt et al. (2023)





Butt, Edward W., Jessica C. A. Baker, Francisco G. Silva Bezerra, Celso von Randow, Ana P. D. Aguiar, and Dominick V. Spracklen. 2023. “Amazon Deforestation Causes Strong Regional Warming.” Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences 120 (45). https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.2309123120.
